uh best case scenario I guess you could say uh user who we have in mind when

wide spectrum of wavelengths but there's
only this ity bitty little portion that is visible to us at any point in time

twice and they'll be able to see that this button is

to maybe notice an issue that you didn't realize that was there uh and are going to be
